thread.title: Online witches recruit Lana Del Rey to put a spell on Donald Trump, maybe - The Verge
thread.title_full: Online witches recruit Lana Del Rey to put a spell on Donald Trump, maybe - The Verge

author: Lizzie Plaugic
title: Online witches recruit Lana Del Rey to put a spell on Donald Trump, maybe - The Verge
text: — Lana Del Rey (@LanaDelRey) February 24, 2017 In a Facebook group dedicated to the ritual , organizers note that this ritual is “a binding, not a hex or a curse.” “In other words, this is not the equivalent of magically punching a Nazi,” the organizers write. “Rather, it is ripping the bullhorn from his hands, smashing his phone so he can’t tweet, tying him up, and throwing him in a dark basement where he can’t hurt anyone.” If you need a little more convincing, the photo that accompanies Lana Del Rey’s tweet also looks a little bit like the poster for the 2016 movie The Love Witch . Coincidence? Probably, yes. In any case, the first date is today, February 24th, so at least some of the mystery should be solved by midnight. Or maybe it won’t be. Next Up In Culture
